items.sentence: She started kissing him as soon as he got home.
She suggested that I give it to him right away.
She suggested that I should clean the bathroom.
I promised I wouldn\'t eat before Tom got home.
Tom was a little surprised by Mary\'s behavior.
Tom doesn\'t want to take part in the ceremony.
Tom thinks that Mary doesn\'t get enough sleep.
Is Tom really going to go to Boston by himself?
Is there a good Chinese restaurant around here?
I thought Tom and Mary made such a nice couple.
